sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"改进，改善"之意。
means: improve ： 最常用词，多指状态或性质上的深刻或重要改进，也可指自身能力的提高。
better ： 多用于口语，指适当地改善原来并非很差的状态或性质，也指社会地位、经济状况的改善。
perfect ： 语义强，通常指使方法、技术等达到完善美好的境地。
refine ： 侧重指使语言、仪态等变得文雅、优美，也可指技艺等的提高。

stems_affixes.word_buile: approve赞成,赞许,同意+al表名词→n.批准,通过;赞成,同意
improve[v.改善, 改进]+ment表名词→n.改进,进步

stems_affixes.value_cn: 证据, 试验, 考验
stems_affixes.word_buile: proof=prov测试,证明→n.&v.证据, 试验, 考验

stems_affixes.value_cn: [of]赞成,赞许,同意;批准,审议,通过
stems_affixes.word_buile: ap加强+prov测试,证明+e→证明可行
dis不+approve赞成,赞许,同意→v.不赞成,不同意[批准]
dis不+prov测试,证明+e→v.证明…不正确,反证
im进入+prove检验, 考验→进入试验→改善, 改进

stems_affixes.value_cn: 证明, 证实, 检验, 考验
stems_affixes.word_buile: prov测试,证明+e→v.证明, 证实, 检验, 考验 v.原来[是], 证明[是]
re反+prov测试,证明+e→反[别人]证明→责骂

means.word_mean: 改善, 改进, 提高

sentences.en: If he can keep from smoking for a month or two his health will improve.
sentences.cn: 他要是能一两个月不抽烟的话, 他的健康一定会有起色。

sentences.en: The proprietor is trying to improve the land.
sentences.cn: 该业主正试图提高这块地的价值。

data.mean: 改进；做出比…更好的成绩

sentence.cn: 志愿服务不仅能提高你在社区的地位，还能让你更快乐。
sentence.en: Volunteering can not only improve your community's status,  it could make you happier.
sentence.from: 2016年高考英语浙江卷（10月） 阅读理解 七选五 原文

sentence.cn: 因此，他花时间提高了他的绘画技巧，并开始出售他的绘画。
sentence.en: So he spent time improving his painting skills and began to sell his paintings.
sentence.from: 2019年高考英语全国卷2 听力 原文

mean.mean: 改进；做出比…更好的成绩

entry.def: If something improves or if you improve it, it gets better.

example.ex: Both the texture and condition of your hair should improve...
example.tran: 你头发的发质与健康状况都应改善。

example.ex: The weather is beginning to improve...

entry.def: If a skill you have improves or you improve a skill, you get better at it.

example.ex: He said he was going to improve his football.
example.tran: 他说他要提高足球技术。

entry.def: If you improve after an illness or an injury, your health gets better or you get stronger.

example.ex: He had improved so much the doctor had cut his dosage.
example.tran: 他康复很快,医生已减少了用药剂量。

entry.def: If you improve on a previous achievement of your own or of someone else, you achieve a better standard or result.

example.ex: We need to improve on our performance against France.
example.tran: 我们需要比对阵法国队时表现得更好。

sentences.sentence: "The editor improved the manuscript with his changes"

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent. (as emprowe or improwe): from Anglo-Norman French emprower (based on Old French prou 'profit', ultimately from Latin prodest 'is of advantage'); -owe was changed to -ove under the influence of prove. The original sense was 'make a profit, increase the value of'; subsequently 'make greater in amount or degree'
